item.title: Security Headers
item.description: What they are? Self-assess your web assets with References Tools Securityheaders.io -> Check the HTTP security used Report-uri.io -> Tools Check in a human readable way the CSP Headers Construct the CSP policies for a given website CSP Fiddler Extension - Build the CSP for you NWebsec - For ASP MVC (Web.config) - easy way to configure CSP in .NET framework Report-uri.io -> read and store CSP reports
